name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Linda J. CASTILE, Petitioner
docket_number: Petition No. 217 Western District Allocatur Docket 1991

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Linda J. CASTILE, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby Granted and the case is remanded to the trial court for consideration of the Motion to Modify Sentence.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
608 A.2d 494
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Linda J. CASTILE, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 23, 1992.
